Txt_Talk_Jipang_Out_MAIN_0_SCENE_0010_01.Text:

ここは　ヒミコさまの　お<RUBY>屋敷[やしき]……

Txt_Talk_Jipang_Room_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_03.Text:
